com.tractrac.model.lib.api.route

Interface IPathRoute

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAttachable, IIdentifiable, IMetadataContainer, INamed, IPropertiesContainer, IRoute

    public interface IPathRoute
extends IRoute

    A route based on a number of paths/segments/tracks/lines. Each segment is traversed in order from start til end (or end til start if segment has set the isReversed flag).

    One segment can occur more than once in the route, and can be travelled in reverse order. Therefor the route is defined by a number of IPathSegments, that specifies which segments is used, and their order and direction.

    See Also:
    IRoute, IPathSegment, ISegment

      • locateAlong

        ICoordinate locateAlong(double mOffset)
        Locate a coordinate along the route at the specified m offset value
        Returns:
